languages.text: These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] These gloves grants the wearer +10 crit chance. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer hasn't moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical hit chance. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer hasn't moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者暴击率提高10%。如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}期间没有移动过，则此{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}翻倍。
languages.original_text: These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者暴击率提高10%。如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}期间没有移动过，则此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}翻倍。

languages.text: このガントレットはクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+10%のボーナスを授ける。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、着用者が自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中移動していない場合、2倍になる。
languages.original_text: These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このガントレットはクリティカルヒット率10％のボーナスを授ける。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、着用者が自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中移動していない場合、2倍になる。

languages.text: Estos guanteletes dan al portador una bonificación de +10 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico. La {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se duplica si el portador no se ha movido durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Estos guanteletes dan al portador una bonificación de +10 % a su probabilidad de impacto crítico. La {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se duplica si el portador no se ha movido durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Handschuhe gewähren dem Träger einen Bonus von +10 % auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} verdoppelt sich, falls sich der Träger in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} noch nicht bewegt hat.
languages.original_text: These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Handschuhe gewähren dem Träger einen Bonus von +10 % auf seine kritische Trefferchance. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} verdoppelt sich, falls sich der Träger in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} noch nicht bewegt hat.

languages.text: Эти наручи дают бонус +10% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}. Если в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} персонаж не двигается, этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается.
languages.original_text: These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Эти наручи дают бонус +10% к шансу критического попадания. Если в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} персонаж не двигается, этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается.
Эти наручи дают бонус +10% к шансу критического попадания. Если в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} персонаж не двигается, этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается.

languages.text: Ces gantelets confèrent à l'utilisateur +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique supplémentaires. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} double si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ces gantelets confèrent à l'utilisateur +10 % de chances supplémentaires d'infliger un coup critique. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} double si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
